title: Can Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard be shuffled into the Deck by the effect of Madolche Lesson?
question:
Can you target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson?

Also, when Madolche Lesson's effect resolves, can Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard be chosen as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck?
answer:
Yes, you can target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson. In that case, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu will be returned to the Extra Deck.

Also, you can choose Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck during the resolution of Madolche Lesson's effect. In that case, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu will be returned to the Extra Deck.
llm_answer:
No, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu cannot be targeted by Madolche Lesson in the Graveyard because it must be face-up on the field to be targeted.

Yes, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in the Graveyard can be chosen as the other monster to shuffle into the Deck when resolving Madolche Lesson's effect.
